snippet.title: R3WiND Official Launch Trailer | Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2
snippet.description:
Trailer for my new game R3WiND, made for Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2. This is the official trailer for the GAME JAM version, as the full release after the jam will likely be quite different and this may not be representative.

https://winnitude.itch.io/r3wind

====

Destroy the Past to Save the Future.

Alien androids are invading Earth's past to dominate the future. Rewind time to various periods in order to stop the invasion, and defeat their leader in the future before she can ever go back and enact her evil plan.

High Octane Action

Taking inspiration from games such as Gears of War(TM), Dark Souls(TM) and Vanquish(TM), R3WiND is a fast-pace third-person shooter which heavily builds around dodging mechanics. Dodge your foes strikes with flawless timing and hit them where it hurts with a varied 3-weapons arsenal, unleash powerful, hard-hitting melee strikes and combos, and dominate your foes with Overclocked Mode, slowing down time for everything in the world except for yourself for dramatic, cinematic combat and high-speed dodges.

Available for Windows and Linux
